content:
Stein family

1 Abraham STEIN                      1788 (Joseph)
 + Hanny LIPMAN                      1790-91 (Dawid)
       married Aug 18, 1805 Krakow
??2? Simch STEIN                     1811 #127a
  2x Mojzesz Jakob STEIN             1814 - Oct 23, 1875 #290
    + Kajla TAYTELBAUM/DATTELBAUM    1819
          married Nov 23, 1837 #79
     3o Hanna Laja STEIN             Sep 28, 1838 #434
       * Jozef Chaim GRONER          Oct 18, 1839 #501
             married Aug 30, 1891 #110
           FAMILY LISTING
     3o Chaja Symche STEIN           1841 #256
       * Aron Hirsch GRONER          Jun 14, 1847 #232
             married May 5, 1874 #13
           FAMILY LISTING
     3x Eyzyk STEIN                  Apr 28, 1844 #169 - 1846 #74
     3x Dawid STEIN                  Dec 13, 1846 #533
       + Matel Judes GRUNWALD        Feb 26, 1857 #733
        4x Mojzesz Wolf STEIN        Feb 15, 1878 #70 - Jan 27, 1880 #36
        4x son STEIN                 Aug 21, 1879 #712 - Aug 22, 1879 #273
        4o Rywka STEIN               Jul 17, 1880 #489
          * Michael GASSNER          Nov 1874 Pilzno
                married Mar 8, 1904 #74
        4x Jakob STEIN               Jan 7, 1883 #11
        4x Izak STEIN                Dec 18, 1884 #776
        4o daughter STEIN            Jun 23, 1886 #426 - Jun 28, 1886 #222
        4x Abraham STEIN             Jun 22, 1887 #364 - Jul 6, 1887 #259
  2x Joseph STEIN                    1815
    + Maria Gittel HEILBORN          1826 #163
          married Oct 20, 1852 #27
  2x Izaak STEIN                     1818 #258
  2o Gittel Malka STEIN              1821 #176
    * Chaim Lobel CYPRES             1818 #370 - Mar 26, 1889 #118
          married Nov 2, 1841 #67
        FAMILY LISTING
  2x Joel Benjamin STEIN             1824 #11 - 1843 #100
